page.title: 06WITHINGTON RECREATION.
page.content: There is a playing field which is used by the local football and cricket teams. There is a pavilion, a lavatory block, some swings,a climbing frame and a sandpit. The football club plays in the second division of the Cirencester League at present but hopes to be promoted to the first division later in the year. The Cricket Club was formed during the 19th.century and plays friendly matches against other villages. Being a country area many field sports are enjoyed by people in the area . Pheasant shoots are held at Manor Farm.The{North Cotswold Hunt}meets every year in the village and trout fishing in rivers and lakes is also popular. The{village hall}is used by vairious groups and clubs such as{W.I. {Scottish Dancers,Youth Club, Bingo and {Drama Group.
